summary: Malcolm the CareBear, pictures incomming soon, but itsd a regular Black Bear with lesser size
descriptionHtml:
Regular Black Bear with lesser size
CareBear Malcolm is a non overpowered 10 minutte summonable bear that will Care for the Dovahkin :) Have fun with him, see him in action at Twitch.tv/formanden_DK :) 
He\'s found in Breezehome, both a breezehome protector and a book (On the table to the far right from the entrance.


thx for downloading
author: Ronnie Nielsen
